Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This exceptional item boasts a wide range of features and benefits that make it an invaluable asset. Given its quality and functionality, I believe it's worth more than $150 to you. Considering its true value, I am extending this exclusive offer to you at $200. This is a limited-time opportunity, so please let me know if you're interested in securing this deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $200. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $200
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
